items.text: short of good length outside off, punched to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: fuller, slides in as he pushes forward, off the inside of the bat, to mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: fullish length, angled towards off, pushed down the ground. Maiden from Rubel
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: flighted on middle and leg, pushed to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: back of a length, flat, shifts back and gets an inside edge onto the pad
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: floated up outside off, driven hard to long-off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.preText: Mahbubul Maruf: "So many bowlers and so many changes, Mashrafee does not let the batsmen get comfortable. Before batsmen read a bowler, he changed them. "
items.text: flat length ball outside off, blocked to point
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: full on midwicket, dabs to midwicket for a rapid single
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: pushes a fuller one back to the bowler on the front foot
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.preText: Mashrafe and Sarfraz - two of the four captains at the Asia Cup - have been miffed at the tournament schedule, so we decided to do some math and see how much rest each team will get in the UAE. Do you agree with the captains?
items.text: shovels a fuller one that's slanted across and gives him just enough room to free the arms.. straight down the ground
items.postText: SarfBD: "Mahneel Musa, I don't think you're doing justice to stats either. Stats are records. If Rubel's stats are bad, they he must be inconsistent with few splendid spells here are there. It's better to rely on records and facts rather than feelings."
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, FOUR runs

items.preText: Changes angle to around the wicket
items.text: short of a length, angled towards off, stands tall and punches to cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: takes a small step down to a length ball and blocks to cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: stands tall and knocks this short of a length delivery past the bowler's right off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: length on off, punched crisply to extra cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: slower full ball, pushed out to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.preText: Ten overs to go. Afghanistan will be happy with 220.
items.text: pushed down the ground for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: slides this into middle, turned away to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: gets the front foot across and turns it away to square leg with the angle
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: plumb. Shakib's problematic angles making life hard for the Afghan batsmen. He was giving no room and sliding them around middle which is dead accurate and makes it hard to swing big. So Nabi decides to sweep but the angle is too sharp and he misses as the ball hits the back leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Nabi lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 10 (24b 0x4 0x6) SR: 41.66

items.text: nicely flighted into leg stump, driven down to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: good length, angled in on off, defended back
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, blocked to cover
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: short, tries to pull but the ball goes over the bat
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: drops a length ball into the gap at cover and takes off for a quick one
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Rashid Khan, 1 run
